title: The World’s Democracies Ask: Why Can’t America Fix Itself?
description: Conversations across continents reveal alarm over the United States’ direction, as it slides away from ideals it once pressed other nations to adopt.
dc:creator: Damien Cave
media:credit: Hilary Swift for The New York Times
media:description: Hundreds of Republican candidates this year have questioned the result of the 2020 presidential election or spread misinformation about it.
